      • createNode

        public void createNode(String parentNodePath,
                       String nodeName,
                       String nodeType,
                       Map<String,org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<String,Integer>> properties)
                throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Creates new node.
        Parameters:
        parentNodePath - Absolute path to parent node.
        nodeName - The name of the node to create.
        nodeType - Node type, like nt:unstructured.
        properties - Map of properties, where key is property name, value is Pair of
        <property value, property type (PropertyType)>.
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if problem with jcr repository occurred
